# k-banner

**_`k-banner` is a part of the `k-banner` family of components._**

`k-banner` is Vuh's web component for banners, used when a website needs to display one on an action's success or failure.

It is strongly encouraged to use Vuh's `k-banner-text` component as its child to keep the design's consistency.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                   | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    |             | `"error" \| "success"` | `'success'` |
